Hi there, we are Sky and Lulu. We would be delighted to propose options to clean the exteriors of your home. You can reach us by phone, SMS and email.

Recent Projects

  • 13 Bedford St Willoughby
  • 21 Burra Rd Artarmon

We are available for house washing, pressure cleaning and window cleaning of houses, units, strata schems and commercial properties.

We specialise in preparing home exteriors prior to sale and the maintenence of strata property exteriors.

We serve the lower north suburbs like Willoughby, Artarmon, Cammeray and Lane Cove
